title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Build a Future-Ready SOC:Transform security logging with OCSF and generative AI
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 构建面向未来的SOC：利用OCSF和生成式AI转型安全日志
abstract: Learn how Merck revolutionized their central logging using Open Cybersecurity Schema Framework (OCSF) to achieve 48% labor efficiency gains and 47% infrastructure cost reduction. Discover how OCSF enables generative AI insights, reducing time-to-insight from full-day analysis to 30-minute solutions. Witness the power of OCSF using Agentic SOC AI Demo.
abstract_cn: 了解默克如何利用开放网络安全架构框架(OCSF)彻底改革其中央日志系统,实现48%的劳动效率提升和47%的基础设施成本降低。探索OCSF如何实现生成式AI洞察,将洞察时间从全天分析缩短至30分钟解决方案。通过Agentic SOC AI演示见证OCSF的强大功能。
